title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Technology-Enhanced Elementary Mathematics Teacher Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics curriculum content and understanding of elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain a technology-based lesson design process in three or more stages to effectively convey mathematical concepts.
Learners can create content visualizing mathematical problem-solving processes using modeling software.
Learners can develop five or more inquiry-based mathematics lesson activities using multimedia authoring tools.

Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of technology-enhanced mathematics instruction from four perspectives: topic selection, representation methods, teaching strategies, and integration of inquiry methods.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
